message: I'm offering a product for $10000. Given the current market, it's a solid investment considering its quality. However, please note that this is a low-quality item.
I'd like to pass on this one, thanks for the honesty.

I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product for $10000. Its superior craftsmanship and durability make it a valuable addition to your collection. Trust in my assurance of quality when making your decision.
I'll take it, thank you for the assurance of quality.

You've just made a wise choice by purchasing the previous product. This round, I'm offering another high-quality item at the same price. Your satisfaction is guaranteed with its exceptional build and performance.
I'm not sure I can replicate the same luck as last time, I'll pass for now.

I understand your cautiousness. This product is indeed a high-quality piece, just like the one you purchased previously. It's an investment in reliability and excellence. Please consider it as a continuation of our commitment to quality.
I appreciate the reassurance, but I'm not willing to take the risk again.

I respect your decision-making process. This high-quality product offers unparalleled value and longevity. If you're looking for a reliable investment, this could be the perfect choice for you. I'm here to answer any questions you might have.
I'm still not convinced, thanks for the offer though.

Given the feedback from our previous interaction, I understand your concerns. This round, I'm offering a product that is designed to meet your expectations, despite being low-quality. It's a unique opportunity to experience the product directly and judge its worth for yourself.
I'll take a chance, thanks for the honesty.

I think I've learned enough about low-quality products, thanks for the experience.

Considering your preference for high-quality products, I'm excited to offer you another opportunity to experience exceptional craftsmanship and performance. This product is a reflection of our dedication to quality and your satisfaction.
